external_games.name: Hidden Object: Hunters for the Secret

name: Hidden Object: Hunters for the Secret
summary: Welcome to Hunters for the Secret is a fascinating hidden object puzzle adventure game that mixes hidden object hunts with mini-games. It was developed by a team of professionals including: script writers, artists, and real-life wizards created a unique magical setting. Together they created enthralling game play and the magical aura of Hidden Object: Hunters for the Secret!!!
